parts.text: {"word":"insecticidal","priority":"★☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"殺虫性の、殺虫剤の","english_definition":"capable of killing insects; relating to insecticides.","examples":[{"sentence":"Insecticidal soap is a relatively safe way to control aphids.","translation":"殺虫石鹸は、アブラムシを駆除する比較的安全な方法です。"},{"sentence":"The farmer used an insecticidal spray on his crops.","translation":"農家は作物に殺虫剤スプレーを使用した。"},{"sentence":"This plant has natural insecticidal properties.","translation":"この植物は天然の殺虫性を持つ。"}],"collocations":["insecticidal spray (殺虫スプレー)","insecticidal soap (殺虫石鹸)","insecticidal properties (殺虫性)","insecticidal effect (殺虫効果)","insecticidal activity (殺虫活性)"],"synonyms":["pesticidal","insect-killing","bug-killing"],"antonyms":["insect-repellent"],"related_terms":["insecticide (殺虫剤)","insect (昆虫)"],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"The adjective \"insecticidal\" describes something that has the ability to kill insects. It is often used to describe chemicals or substances used to control insect populations.","priority":"★★☆"}],"etymology":{"value":"From \"insecticide\" + \"-al\". \"Insecticide\" is from \"insect\" + \"-cide\" (from Latin \"caedere\" meaning \"to kill\").","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ɪnˌsɛk.tɪˈsaɪ.dəl/","syllables":"in-sec-ti-ci-dal"},"inflection":{"notes":"This word is an adjective and does not have plural forms or verb conjugations."},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The insecticidal was sprayed on the plants.","correct":"✓ The insecticidal spray was sprayed on the plants.","note":"\"Insecticidal\" is an adjective, so it needs to modify a noun. Use \"insecticidal spray\" or \"insecticide\" as the noun."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"Low frequency","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"The word \"insecticidal\" is a technical term used to describe something that kills insects. It is often used in the context of agriculture, gardening, and pest control. Understanding this word requires some knowledge of science and vocabulary related to pesticides and insects."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The government is promoting the use of less toxic insecticidal products.","translation":"政府は毒性の低い殺虫剤製品の使用を推進している。","type":"general","meaning_category":"殺虫性の"},{"sentence":"The study examined the insecticidal effects of various plant extracts.","translation":"その研究は、さまざまな植物抽出物の殺虫効果を調べた。","type":"scientific","meaning_category":"殺虫性の"},{"sentence":"The farmer chose to use an insecticidal treatment to protect his crops from pests.","translation":"農家は害虫から作物を守るために殺虫処理を選択した。","type":"agricultural","meaning_category":"殺虫剤の"}]}
